English: Kill the Golden Aibatt in dungeons and get drop bonuses!

Complete Eggcellent's Meadow to get Pink Easter Eggs!
Destroy the stars in the night sky to obtain star fragments!
Night has come! The stars are coming out. Find them in the sky!
Nighttime has passed, the stars are disappearing.
Spend fewer Dungeon Coins when taking on missions or entering dungeons!
Flyff Universe is turning 1! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Log in each day for 40 minutes to receive rewards!
Reach new levels during the event period and receive rewards! Only on the Flyff World Championship server!
Exchange FWC Gear with [FWC Manager] Ava to get more rewards!
The #bFlyff World Championship#nb is a global competition held until September 7th, 2023. Join this server with boosted EXP and Drops and compete for exceptional prizes!
Earn coins by defeating monsters or completing quests, then spend them at the Gacha Machine to receive exceptional rewards!
Collect Music Notes and Music Score Scrolls from monsters and exchange them with Bach.
Player Survey! Aim for special rewards!
It's been a bumper year, so there are a lot of monsters out to get crops.\nIt's time to hunt them down! Can you help?
1.3 Update Survey! Aim for special rewards!
Exchange letters with a loved one or friend to complete the phrases below!
Let's celebrate the 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!
Flyff Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon to earn a permanent costume!
Complete Daily Quests to earn dice, then roll them for rewards!
Plunder treasure from the Pirate Ship!
Log in each day for 30 minutes to receive rewards!
Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!
Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!
Increase all life mastery gains by 20%!
Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!
Increase your life production speed by 20%!
Reduces durability cost by 1 when gathering!
Life Wandering Merchant Early Refresh Event!
The Wandering Merchant's inventory refreshes 30 minutes earlier during the event!
20% more gathering objects spawn during the event!
Life Wandering Merchant Extra Stock Event!
The Wandering Merchant offers 2 additional items for sale during the event!
Successfully upgrade an item to each level from +1 to +10 during the event to receive rewards. Complete all 10 stages to receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.
Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the Discord for more information.

During the 2026 Valentine's Day Event, I♥YOU items can be obtained from the Valentine's Day Letter, which drops from defeated monsters; only monsters up to 10 levels below your character's level are eligible to drop the item.
